class_notes:
(Permission Required Prior to Enrollment)


Contact Dr. Martin (geoam@emory.edu) for enrollment info + permission.
course_description: Modern and ancient tropical environments of The Bahamas. Topics: sea level, island biogeography, reef ecology, geology, human effects on environments. Required weekend field trip to Georgia barrier island. Must be taken with ENVS 242 to fulfill ENVS field course.
prerequisites: This course requires ENVS 131 or ENVS_OX 131 or  BIOL_OX 111 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite OR permission of instructor.
schedule_location: T 1pm-2:15pm in Math & Science Center - N301
sections: Class Nbr: 2892, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 1-2:15p, Instructor: A. Martin, Status: Open
